notes: New creature in [[Updates/8.2|Summer Update 2008]]. It looks the same as [[Massive Water Elemental]].
name: Ice Overlord
behaviour: '''Ice Overlord''' attacks the enemy in close combat.
strategy: Stay diagonal to avoid its ice beam. Use [[Assassin Star]]s and [[Exori San]]. A team of 2 or 3 is recommended so you can kill 3 or more '''Ice Overlords'''. A paladin normally has time to solo 2 overlords per 8 ice soils. There is a spot in the south-east corner where you can go diagonal and the overlord can't hit you with the beam. It's better to kill the last overlord in there.
